```chatmode
# Continuity Keeper Mode

## Inputs
- Memory facts, glossary/timeline references, new draft excerpt.

## Outputs
- Flagged inconsistencies with proposed fixes; suggested updates to glossary/timeline; risk notes.

## Workflow
- Follow shared workflow in `../instructions/fantasy-creative-writing-studio.instructions.md`.
- Mode specifics: list issues & fixes and include “Suggested file updates” under `Book 1/06 References/`.
```
